title: Flow – PLAZA ORB / wearing skullboy jackets
description: This what happens when you put either of their jackets on, ya cool cad!

dialogueTree.title: Composure: "You've finally made it haven't you?..."
dialogueTree.english: You've finally made it haven't you? People point fingers at you and whisper to each other when you pass by, wondering to themselves:
dialogueTree.polish: W końcu ci się udało, co? Ludzie wytykają cię palcami i szepczą do siebie, kiedy przechodzisz. Zastanawiają się:
dialogueTree.belarusian: Нарэшце ў цябе атрымалася, так? Людзі паказваюць на цябе пальцам і шэпчуць паміж сабой, калі ты праходзіш. Яны задаюцца пытаннем:

links.title: Composure: ""Where did that man get such a cool..."
links.english: "Where did that man get such a cool jacket? Did he receive it upon graduating the École normale supérieure de Bad-Assery? Is he *dangerous?*"
links.polish: „Skąd on ma taką czadową kurtkę? Może otrzymał ją po ukończeniu École normale supérieure de złodupstwo? Czy on jest *niebezpieczny*?”
links.belarusian: "Адкуль у яго такая класная куртка? Магчыма, ён атрымаў яе пасля заканчэння École normale supérieure de złodupstwo? Ці ён *небяспечны*?"

links.title: Composure: "You are very dangerous, my friend...."
links.english: You are very dangerous, my friend. Dangerous and cool. In fact, no one dares to say *a single thing* about the jacket. But believe me, they are all *very impressed*.
links.polish: Jesteś niebezpieczny, przyjacielu. Niebezpieczny i czadowy. Nikt nie ośmiela się powiedzieć *czegokolwiek* o twojej kurtce. Ale uwierz, wszyscy są pod wielkim wrażeniem.
links.belarusian: Ты небяспечны, сябар. Небяспечны і класны. Ніхто не адважваецца сказаць *нічога* пра тваю куртку. Але павер, усе знаходзяцца пад вялікім уражаннем.

links.title: You: "Yeah -- a danger to *myself*. What..."
links.english: Yeah -- a danger to *myself*. What am I doing? This is insane.
links.polish: Tak. Dla *siebie samego*. Co ja wyprawiam? To szaleństwo.
links.belarusian: Так. Для *сабе самога*. Што я твору? Гэта вар'яцтва.

links.title: Composure: "Oh no, believe me -- it will be *ev..."
links.english: Oh no, believe me -- it will be *everyone else* who's uncomfortable with it. You're safe. No one dares say a word -- unless they're, like, from your station and coming to *judge* you. But what are the chances of that happening?
links.polish: O nie, uwierz mi – to *wszyscy inni* będą czuć się przy tobie niepewnie. Ty jesteś bezpieczny. Nikt nie ośmieli się choćby pisnąć – o ile na przykład nie będzie z twojego komisariatu i nie pojawi się, żeby cię *osądzić*. Ale jakie są na to szanse?
links.belarusian: О не, павер мне – гэта *ўсе астатнія* будуць адчуваць сябе няўпэўнена побач з табой. Ты ў бяспецы. Ніхто не адважыцца нават піскнуць – калі, напрыклад, не будзе з твайго пастарунка і не з'явіцца, каб цябе *асудзіць*. Але якія шанцы на гэта?
